Activity: Wake up, get ready for work. Check schedule and prepare for the day ahead. Quick scan of financial news headlines on Bloomberg.
Arrive at the office. Check emails and calendar for urgent matters. Prioritize tasks for the day.

Review the data infrastructure progress with @Dsde-1 (Data Scientist) and @Dsde-2 (Data Scientist). Ensure the data pipeline is functioning correctly and providing accurate data for the quantitative researchers. Discuss data quality and validation procedures.

Meet with @Sdev-1 (Software Developer) and @Sdev-2 (Software Developer) to assess the progress on the trading platform development. Ensure the platform is reliable and efficient. Review code quality and security.

Meet with @Ir-1 (Head of Investor Relations) and @Mkt-1 (Marketing & Communications Specialist) to discuss the marketing strategy for attracting UHNWI investors. Review the fund's marketing materials and ensure they are compliant with SEC regulations. Plan investor roadshows.

Meet with @Onbd-1 (Client Onboarding Specialist) to discuss the client onboarding process. Ensure the process is efficient and compliant with KYC/AML regulations. Review client documentation requirements.
Lunch Break: Review WSJ headlines while eating a quick lunch.
Review the Risk Management Framework with @Qres-1 @Qres-2 @Qres-3 and @Comp-1. Ensure a robust risk management framework and identify, asses and mitigate potential risks.
Schedule a meeting with @Audit-1 (External Auditor) to discuss the audit plan and timeline. Review the fund's financial statements and internal controls. Address any audit concerns.
@PM-1, @Larch-1 - EMAIL: Discuss potential delays in the software development timeline and strategize solutions to keep the project on track. Offer support and guidance to the team.
Review the minutes from yesterday's meeting and follow up on any action items. Respond to outstanding emails and prioritize tasks for tomorrow.
